meaningMnemonic: One person <kanji>starve</kanji>s and another person <kanji>starve</kanji>s. Then more people. So much starve that there's <vocabulary>starvation</vocabulary> going on. It's <vocabulary>famine</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>hunger</vocabulary>, everywhere.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
